title: Simplifying Rust Option Handling with Map
description: In this lab, we explore the usage of the map() combinator in Rust to simplify the control flow and handle Option types in a concise and modular way.

meta.title: Rust Programming | Option Handling with Map Combinator
meta.description: Explore the usage of the map() combinator in Rust to simplify control flow and handle Option types in a concise and modular way.
meta.keywords: Rust, Programming, Option, Map Combinator, Control Flow, Modular Programming
